name: The Adventures of Sir Duckington
description:
STORY

Take a mysterious journey into the human pysche in this poetic platforming game that explores how our imagination can be both our greatest ally and toughest foe.

CONTROLS

Enter - Menu Selection

Left/Right/Up/Down Arrows - Menu Movement

Left/Right Arrows - Move Left/Right

Up Arrow/ 'X' - Jump

Down Arrow - Crouch

Space Bar - Dash

CREDITS

This game was made in the span of one week for the Fall 2021 DeSales University ACM Chapter Game Jam, and was selected as the 1st place winner. The theme for this Game Jam was "We don't see things as they are, we see them as we are." All music, story design, level design, and programming was completed by Lucas Acosta-Morales. Artwork used is Licensed through Creative Commons and edited by Lucas Acosta-Morales.
